job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brImagine what you could do here At Apple great ideas have a way of becoming great products services and customer experiences very quickly Bring passion and dedication to your job and theres no telling what you could accomplishbrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong brExperience with containers and container management platforms such as KubernetesbrbrFamiliarity with workflows system and state convergence modelbrbrFamiliarity with Software as a ServicebrbrFamiliarity with Postgres technologiesbrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brWe are a software development team that develops and operates large scale database services such as Cassandra Redis and Postgres Our work involves the development of the control plane and infrastructure to operate these databases at scale We are currently building new infrastructure to operate relational databases at scale starting with Postgres We are in the process of building a team of software engineers to help us accomplish this goalbrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brBS or MS in Computer Science  related fields or equivalent work experiencebrbr brRole Number 200230357brbr
